attributes.comment:
This comment is in reference to file code CMS-0058-NC related to the RFI for national directory of healthcare providers and services. Requirements should:

•Provide RESTful API access in order to empower payers to replicate data or generate custom collections for various purposes such as preferred providers
•Provide easy registration and access for providers to update their profiles
•Provide a way for end users to report information discrepancies, then notify the provider.
•Add incentives to keep profiles up to date and penalties for those who don't (even as simple as a badge indicating how long since a provider updated their profile).
•Include flexible profile fields to track points of contact including common social media channels and space for future ones
•Include attributes, such as whether online bookings are accepted
•Provide reporting and analytics capabilities for data quality, monitoring, audit
•Allow updates by using Artificial Intelligence
•Allow member/providers can report error in data for correction
•Provider Rating based on member feedback
•Allow to Identify In / Out Network Providers
•Include Provider Directory Data Accuracy in Value-Based Payment or penalties
•Enforce workflow for collecting data
•Enforce structure data entry to minimize errors
•Allow to include complimentary sources such Google to improve data accuracy
•Provider can be accountable for their provider data accuracy
•Increase provider accountability
•Allow providers and other consumers to flag provider directory discrepancies

Thank you for the opportunity to comment.
